title: Profile title
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to their own profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the title says 'Your Profile'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigated to any other user's profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the title says 'User Profile'

title: Avatar List Page + Details View + flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device 
AND user is logged in
AND user navigates to Profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on the Avatar icon (Square icon)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Avatar List Page should be displayed

Things to be displayed on the page: 
* Avatars title
* Back arrow on the top left
* 'Unlock avatars with tokens. Pick any unlocked avatar to customize your profile.'
* grid of available avatars. First, the avatars user earned should be displayed, second,  avatars that user hasn’t earned yet. Unearned avatars have a “locked” image.
* user's current portrait should have a white border

custom_steps_separated.content:
For both earned and unearned avatars, the user should be able to click on the image to open a details view for that avatar. 
WHEN user taps on earned avatar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the avatar page will be displayed with the selected avatar.

Things to be displayed: 
* Avatars title
* exit button on the top right corner
* selected avatar
* avatar's title
* short description of the avatar
* active 'Set As Your Avatar' button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects new avatar and taps on ‘Set As Your Avatar’
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a newly selected Avatar is displayed on the user’s profile. User is brought back to their Profile page.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects the current avatar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the CTA button is gray
AND button is unclickable 
AND the CTA copy is 'Currently Active Avatar'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on unearned avatar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the avatar page will be displayed with the selected avatar.

Things to be displayed: 
* Avatars title
* exit button on the top right corner
* selected avatar with lock image
* avatar's title
* short description of the avatar
* non-active 'Set As Your Avatar' button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user click on the exit button on the Avatars View page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will be taken to the Avatar List page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the back arrow on the Avatars page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will be taken to the Profile page

title: User's default avatar
custom_preconds: GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
custom_steps:
WHEN user signs up in the app
AND user selects their favorite team during onboarding 
AND user navigates to the Profile page
custom_expected: THEN user's avatar reflects the user's favorite team logo

title: Avatar border
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device

custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Profile page
custom_expected:
THEN user's Avatar should have a border color based on user's XP Level

title: Wallpaper List Page + Details View + flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user navigates to Profile page
custom_expected:
The background should be the same color as the user’s favorite team.
The user is able to edit/customize the background.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on the Wallpaper (Square icon)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Wallpapers List Page should be displayed

Things to be displayed on the page:
* Wallpapers title
* Back arrow on the top left corner
* 'Unlock wallpapers with tokens. Pick any unlocked wallpaper to customize your profile.'
* grid of available wallpapers. First, the wallpaper user earned should be displayed, second, the wallpaper that user hasn’t earned yet. Unearned wallpaper have a “locked” image.
* user's current portrait should have a white border

custom_steps_separated.content:
For both earned and unearned wallpapers, the user should be able to click on the image to open a details view for that wallpaper.
WHEN user taps on earned wallpaper
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the wallpapers page will be displayed with the selected wallpaper.

Things to be displayed:
* Wallpapers title
* exit button on the top right corner
* selected wallpaper
* wallpaper's title
* short description of the wallpaper
* active 'Set As Your Wallpaper' button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects a new wallpaper and taps on ‘Set As Your Wallpaper’
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a newly selected wallpaper is displayed on the user’s profile. User is brought back to their Profile page.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects the current wallpaper
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the CTA button is gray
AND button is unclickable
AND the CTA copy is 'Currently Active Wallpaper'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on unearned wallpaper
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the wallpaper page will be displayed with the selected wallpaper.

Things to be displayed:
* Wallpapers title
* exit button on the top right corner
* selected wallpaper with lock image
* wallpaper's title
* short description of the wallpaper
* non-active 'Set As Your Wallpaper' button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user click on the exit button on the Wallpapers View page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will be taken to the Wallpapers List page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the back arrow on the Wallpapers page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will be taken to the Profile page

title: XP
custom_preconds: GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN existing user logs in
AND user navigates to Profile page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN should be able to see the current Token value
AND the progress bar is “filled” to the correct amount based on the values for that user.
AND the XP value in Profile should match the XP value on the Home tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN new user signs up
AND user navigates to Profile page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN new user should be displayed with XP 0/200 by default

title: Tokens (RP)
custom_preconds: GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN existing user logs in
AND user navigates to Profile page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN should be able to see the current Token value 
AND the progress bar is “filled” to the correct amount based on the values for that user.
AND the Token value in Profile should match the Token value on the Home tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN new user signs up 
AND user navigates to Profile page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN new user should see 50 meaning 0/50 by default

title: Tokens bar after user achieves the goal
custom_preconds: GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
custom_steps: WHEN user played the games and achieved the tokens goal
custom_expected:
THEN user received the Reward Pack (results tab)
AND user's token is set back to 0 (It's to simulate that user are spending those tokens for the awarded packs user received)

AND user received the same avatar several times
AND user navigates to Profile page
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Avatar section
custom_expected: THEN the avatar has a count number on the top right corner of the avatar indicating how many times user received this avatar

GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device

title: Reactions Count
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user navigates to Profile page
AND user has reactions

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the reaction count
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the numbers for social stats should be formatted: ###.#M (3 digits, then 1 significant digit after, then the notation, if applicable when greater than 999)
AND at .5K we should round up, otherwise round down
AND the K should be capitalized

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has zero reactions to some emotes
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN that emote is shown with a “0”

title: Friends section - user has friends
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user navigates to the Profile page
AND user has friends

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is on the Friends section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is able to see friends

Things to be displayed: 
* friends avatar
* 'See All' button (even if the user has only one friend)
* “Invite Friends” link on the same line as “See All”
* friends should be displayed be left adjusted
* friends count and an icon next to that number on the right

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has ONE or TWO friends
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN one or two friend's avatars should be displayed in the friend's section
AND there should be nothing filling the empty space of the third avatar spot.
AND the friend's order should not have any logic, it's displayed randomly

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has more than THREE friends
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN three friend's avatars should display in the friend's section and the rest of friends will be displayed on the Friends View page
AND friend's order should not have any logic, it's displayed randomly

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a friend's avatar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN friends should be displayed with their proper XP Level Border around the avatar
AND avatars should be clickable and take a user directly to that friend’s profile. (separate TC)

title: See All -  Friends view page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user navigates to Profile page
AND scrolls down to Friends section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on 'See All' CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be taken to the Friend Page where they can view all of their friends

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Friends View page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with
* Header: Your Friends 
* Body message: 
iOS: Invite your friends to play on MLB Play. Tap a friend's avatar to view their profile. Swipe left on a friend to manage your list. 
Android: Invite your friends to play on MLB Play. Tap a friend's avatar to view their profile.
* List of friends is displayed with their name and level including their avatar image and the avatar border based on friends's XP level
* 'Invite Friends' button (button is not overlapping the friends list)

* friend's avatar + wallpaper

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a friend's trophies
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to see friends earned trophies

title: Adding Friends from Profile page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user navigates to Profile page
AND user scrolls down to Friends section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Invite Friends' CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN share sheet should open

iOS: 'Let's compete on MLB Play' share sheet display with logo
Android: 'Let's compete on MLB Play' share sheet display with no logo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects the option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see the share link

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user sends an invite
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user gets the invite via any shared method

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's friend accepts the invitation
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with Friend Added pop up

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps OK on the pop up
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Friends are displayed on each other's friends list

title: Removing friends from profile page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user has friends
AND user navigates to Profile page
AND user scrolls down to Friends section
AND user clicks on 'See All' CTA

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is 'Your Friends' page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will display with remove icon (icon vary based on platform)

custom_steps_separated.content:
iOS: 
WHEN user swipes left on the friend
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the red 'X' button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
iOS: WHEN the user taps on the 'X' button
Android:
WHEN the user taps on the person icon with the dash on the friend's line
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be displayed with 

Copy: 

Are You Sure? 
This friend will no longer appear on your leaderboard. You can always share a link to add them again.'
 
'Cancel' button (gray background)
'Remove' button (blue background) or 'Delete' on Android

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Cancel
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User should be taken back to  'Your Friends' page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Delete
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN selected friend is removed from user's friends list

title: Prizes section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
ADD user is on the profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls down
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the prize section; below the friends section and above the reactions earned section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the prizing section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 
* 'Prizes' title
* number of prizes earned and number of available prizes in x/x format
* 3 images of prizes or prizes placeholders
* 'See All' link

AND Prizes should be sorted in the following order:
- First, prizes that the user has earned most recently
- Then, prizes that more MLB Play users have earned (if the user has not earned 3 prizes)
AND there should always be three prizes displayed, even if the user has not earned three

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the prize or prize placeholders
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to My Prizes page (separate TC)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'See All'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to Prizes page (separate TC)

title: Redeem flow - email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AMD user has an available prize

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user navigates to Profile -> Prizes Page -> Prize Category
AND selects the redeemable prize
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the Prize Detail page (Prize Details Modal - earned prize TC)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Redeem Now' CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taking to Redeem Email page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* 'Request Prize' header
* copy 'Please confirm your email address and press “Confirm,” then we’ll reach out to you with instructions on how to redeem this prize in the next 5 business days' - this copy is dynamic. This copy could not be present if it's empty in spanner for your uid
* 'Instructions on how to redeem your prize will be sent to:' copy
* User's Email Address (non clickable)
* 'Confirm' button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks 'Confirm'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN'Request Submitted' is displayed at the bottom
AND 'Confirm' button is disabled

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user closes the Request Prize page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is brought back to Prize page
AND 'Request Submitted' text is displayed
AND 'Need help? Contact customer service'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Contact customer service'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with options to email to play@mlb.com

title: Redeem flow - code
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AMD user has an available prize

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user navigates to Profile -> Prizes Page -> Prize Category
AND selects the redeemable prize
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the Prize Detail page (Prize Details Modal - earned prize TC)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Redeem Now' CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taking to Redeem Code page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* 'Get Code' header
* redeem instruction
* Code field
* 'Tap to Copy Code' copy underneath the code
* 'Done' cta

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user copies the code (by clicking on it)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the code background changes to gray
AND the copy underneath it is changed to 'Copied!'
AND user is able to paste this code

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Done'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to 'Prizes' page

title: Prize Details Modal - after request is submitted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
ADD user is on Prize Details page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views Prize Details page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* 'Prize' title
* back arrow in the top left corner
* Prize image 
* Unearned Prize Name 
* prize description. Example: The MLB.TV Month Prize could read: “You can earn this prize through the following badge challenges: Beat the Streak: 25 Streak; Diamond Derby: Perfect Game; Bingo: X”
* 'Redeem Now' button is not displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on back arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to Prize category page

title: Confirmation email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user submitted the request for prizing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives a confirmation email

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the confirmation email
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

Subject: Your MLB Play Prize Request Confirmation

Reply-to: play@mlb.com

Body: Thank you for confirming your email with MLB Play. We’ll reach out in 5 business days regarding your Prize: [Prize name].

title: EC - redeeming prize twice
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user received a prize 
AND tried to redeem it again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is not able to  redeem it again

title: EC - redeeming prize - incorrect email address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user received a prize 
AND user incorrectly submits their email address
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is not able to  redeem it 
AND user can only rectify this by contacting Customer Support

title: Badges section - user has badges
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user navigates to the Profile page
AND user has badges

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is on the Badges section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with
* 'Badges' title
* Amount of badges earned and badges available on the top right i.e 3/22
* Six badges - filling the top row of three first, left to right, and then the second row. Earned badges go first and then unearned
* “See All” link

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user select See All
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with
* 'Badges' title
* Copy -> Earn badges for completing tasks. Tap any badge to view its description and rarity.
* All Badges - Include earned and Locked with badges name

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on any badged
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be displayed with the Badge details for the badge user is viewing. (separate TC)

title: Badges section - user has no badges
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user navigates to Profile page
AND user has no badges earned

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is on Badges section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with
* 'Badges' title
* Amount of badges earned and badges available on the top right i.e 0/22
* Six grey circle badges with a lock - filling the top row of three first, left to right, and then the second row. Earned badges go first and then unearned
* “See All” link

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'See All' CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with
* 'Badges' title
* Body message -> Earn badges for completing tasks. Tap any badge to view its description and rarity.
* Locked with badges name

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on any locked badge
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be displayed with the Badge name and short description for the badge user viewing.

title: Badges List Page + Details View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user navigates to Profile page
AND user scrolls down to Badges section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on ‘See All’
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be taken to Badges List page

* 'Badges' title
* Back button on top left 
* Copy 'Earn badges for completing tasks. Tap any badge to view its description and rarity.'
* Grid of badges.  First, the badges user earned should be displayed, second, badges that user hasn’t earned yet. Unearned badges have a “locked” image.

custom_steps_separated.content:
For both earned and unearned avatars, the user should be able to click on the image to open a details view for that badge.
WHEN user taps on earned badge
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with the details view of the Badge 

* 'Badges' Title 
* Badge image filled with respective color(based on design), name, count (X time earned), Name and short description 
* X icon on the top right corner

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on locked badge
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should display with the details view of the Badge 

* 'Badges' Title 
* Badge with a lock icon in circle, name and short description
* X icon on the top right corner

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on X icon on top right cornet
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user taken back to Badges list view

title: Earning same badge several time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user received the same badge several times
AND user navigates to Profile page
AND user scrolls down to Badges section
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Badges section
custom_expected: THEN the badge has a count number on the top right corner of the badge indicating how many times user received this badge

title: Trophies section - user has trophies

* 'Trophies' title
* Trophies earned by user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN use taps on any earned trophy
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be displayed with the Trophy details for the trophy user is viewing. (separate TC)

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be taken to Trophies List page

Includes:
* 'Trophies' title 
* Back button on Top left 
* copy ***
* All trophies with the image by design, Name below the trophy image

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on any Trophy (detail View)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with the details view of the Trophy

* 'Trophies' title
* X icon on the top right corner
* Trophy's image
* Trophy's Name and short description

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on X icon Details View page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken back to List View page of the Trophies

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on the back arrow on the List View page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to Profile page

title: User earn trophy or trophies
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user played the contest

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is leveling up on their rank (XP bar)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should receive a trophy 
AND this trophy should be displayed in Results tab
AND this trophy should be displayed in Profile tab under Trophies section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user have earned trophies from past seasons
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all past season trophies which user earned should display in Trophies section

title: Settings Menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device 
AND the user logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Profile -> Settings Menu
custom_expected:
THEN user should be displayed with 

1. Your Friend Code
2. Favorite Team: <Team Name if selected already>  
3. Notifications  
4. Account 
5. Beat the Streak Podcast 
6. More MLB Apps 
7. Privacy Policy 
8. Do Not Sell My Data 
9. Terms of Use
10. Beat the Streak Official Rules
11. FAQ
12. Contact Us 
13. Logout 
14. Delete My Account (iOS only) 

App Version should display at the bottom

title: Favorite Team

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the favorite team selection page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with:

* 'Favorite Team' title
* back arrow on Android; exit icon on iOS
* copy 'Select your favorite team.
You can change at any time.'
* Grid of all teams with their logos and names (make sure logos and names are up to date)
* Selected team has a white border 
*'Save Favorite Team' button (active)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects a different team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN newly selected team has a white border

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks 'Save Favorite Team'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to the Setting page and newly selected favorite team is displayed next to 'Favorite Team'

title: Notifications
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
AND user is on the Profile -> Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on the Notifications
custom_expected:
THEN iOS:
The user should be displayed with Prompt for Allow/don't Allow if previously not enabled notifications

Once the User clicks on Allow then the user should be taken to Device Settings to make their preference. There should be a toggle to enable/disable

ANDROID: The user should be taken to the Device Settings -> App notifications page to make preferences. There should be a toggle to enable/disable

title: Delete My Account -iOS
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB  Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user is on Profile tab -> Settings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on Delete My Account
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought up to 'MLB account deletion' web view page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user fills the required fields and clicks 'Delete My Account' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN 'Please confirm your request' page is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user confirms the request (through email)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN users account is deleted
AND user is not able to log in using this email
AND user is not displayed in friend's accounts

AND user is logged in

custom_steps: WHEN user scrolls down
custom_expected: THEN user should be displayed with the App Version at the bottom of the page and it should match the data.

title: Profile -> Settings ->  Your Friend Code display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB  Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user on Profile tab -> Settings -> Your Friend Code

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is on 'Your Friend Code' page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with:

* Your Friend Code
* X icon on top right corner
* Share this code so that others can add you as a friend.
* Code (XXX XXX or Android XXXXXX)
* Enter a friend's code below to add them.
* Field to Enter code
* Add a Friend CTA (Bottom)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters a friend code
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Add a Friend button should be filled with blue color

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects Add a Friend after entering code
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with message Success! `friend nickname` added

title: Your Friend Code - Adding Friend
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB  Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user is on Profile -> Settings -> Your Friend Code

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user viewing their code
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the code requirements should be: 

* should be 6 digit long
* should only alphanumeric
* should be all caps

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps their code
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be able to copy the code

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has the friend's code copied
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to paste the code in the frends code field

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user pastes the code
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN code should displayed

title: Your Friend Code flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB  Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user is on Profile -> Settings -> Your Friend Code

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user types in 6 digit code and deletes one digit
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the error message 'Please enter a 6-digit token' appears (in orangish)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters correct code and Tap on Add a Friend button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with the message 'Success! $friendname$ added (in green)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to Friend section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be displayed with the friend they added in step 2

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters an invalid code
custom_steps_separated.expected: After user taps 'Add a Friend' button, the error message appears 'Invalid code. Please try again' (in red) above the Add a Friend CTA

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps outside the keyboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to dismiss it

title: Adding self as friend through code
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB  Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user is on profile page -> Settings -> Your Friend Code
custom_steps: WHEN user types their own code to the friend's code field
custom_expected:
THEN user sees the error message as a modal: “Looks like you're trying to add yourself as a friend. Check the code and try again.”
AND user does not see themselves in the friends list
